summary: Email/password authentication testing completed successfully. All 11 features tested and working: Tabbed login UI (Sign In/Sign Up), Sign In form with email/password/forgot password, Sign Up form with name/email/password/confirm password, Google sign-in on both tabs, password validation (8+ chars, letter, number), invite-only signup for non-first users, correct error messages for invalid credentials and Google-only accounts, forgot password returns generic success message, reset password page loads at /reset-password, verify-reset-token validates tokens correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Error toast shows 'Failed to execute json on Response: body stream already read' instead of 'Invalid email or password' on login failure

passed_tests: Login page shows tabbed interface with Sign In and Sign Up tabs
Sign In form has email, password fields and forgot password link
Sign Up form has name, email, password, confirm password fields
Both tabs have Google sign-in option
POST /api/auth/signup validates email format (422 for invalid)
POST /api/auth/signup validates password requirements (8+ chars, letter, number)
POST /api/auth/signup rejects signups without invite (403 Forbidden)
POST /api/auth/signup accepts signup with valid invite and creates user
POST /api/auth/login returns 401 for invalid credentials
POST /api/auth/login returns 401 for non-existent users
POST /api/auth/login successfully logs in user with correct credentials
POST /api/auth/forgot-password returns generic success message (prevents email enumeration)
Password reset page loads at /reset-password route
Reset password page shows 'Invalid Link' for missing token
Reset password page shows 'Invalid Link' for invalid token
GET /api/auth/verify-reset-token/{token} returns valid=false for invalid tokens
POST /api/auth/reset-password returns 400 for invalid token
Frontend password mismatch validation works
Frontend shows invite required note on Sign Up tab
Successful signup redirects to home page with success toast
Successful login redirects to home page with 'Welcome back!' toast
action_items: MINOR: Fix error handling in LoginPage.jsx - the 'body stream already read' error suggests response is being consumed twice. Consider cloning response before reading JSON.
critical_code_review_comments: Password reset emails are MOCKED - RESEND_API_KEY is not configured in backend/.env, so actual emails won't be sent
The error handling in LoginPage.jsx may have a race condition where response body is read twice
seed_data_creation: Created test invite and user for signup/login testing - cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Email/password authentication is fully implemented. Password requirements: 8+ chars, at least one letter, at least one number. First user becomes Coach Developer (admin), subsequent users need invite. Resend API key is NOT configured - password reset emails are MOCKED. Test user credentials can be created by first creating an invite in MongoDB, then signing up with that email.

mocked_apis.Resend Email API: Password reset emails will not actually be sent until RESEND_API_KEY is configured in backend/.env
